definitions.definition: A wandering troop or gang ; especially, a clan or tribe of a nomadic people (originally Tatars) migrating from place to place for the sake of pasturage , plunder , etc.; a predatory multitude .
A large number of people or things.
examples: We were beset by a horde of street vendors who thought we were tourists and would buy their cheap souvenirs.

main_definition: A wandering troop or gang ; especially, a clan or tribe of a nomadic people (originally Tatars) migrating from place to place for the sake of pasturage , plunder , etc.; a predatory multitude .
secondary_definitions: A large number of people or things.
